title: Spare hours /
author: Brown, John
snippet: " To show how pointed to time he was, one day he had to go to Buccleugh, eighteen miles up the Ettrick, and haviug to ride down the moors by Ashkirk, and then to go on to St. Boswell's to see old Raeburn,  he wished a change of horse at Riddell fixed one o'clock, and one of his sons met him at a point of the road at the very hour, though he had ridden forty miles through hills hardly passable.
